bio.about: With over 5 years of experience in coding and front-end development. Expert in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind. Additionally, I have 2 years of experience working with Vue.js and Nuxt. Passionate about solving UI challenges, writing clean, maintainable, and reusable code while ensuring a DRY architecture. I also have a keen eye for pixel-perfect designs. Staying up to date with the latest technologies and trends to continuously improve my skills and build better solutions.

experiences.description:
• Maintaining and refactoring the Filimo School project core and components to improve code quality, readability, and scalability.
  • Implementing campaigns by taking ownership of front-end execution and collaborating closely with the product and design teams to ensure seamless user experience and brand consistency.

• Worked with an international team based in Berlin, collaborating across different time zones and cultures.
  • Worked with the DataGuard.com team, a GDPR compliance platform focused on data privacy and security, ensuring businesses adhere to European data protection regulations. Contributed to security-focused development practices.
  • Implemented a design system using microfrontend technology, enabling modular, scalable, and reusable UI components across multiple applications.
  • Worked with the Taxmaro.com team, an HR and accounting platform, maintaining and debugging the front-end structure while implementing new features to improve functionality and user experience.

• Gained experience in a fast-growing startup with a large user base and a team of over 200 members.
  • Collaborated with functional and cross-functional teams to align on goals and drive product success.
  • Implemented designs, maintained code, and conducted code reviews for Basalamâ€™s core products and ventures.
  • Developed front-end features such as the spinning wheel, shopping cart, product pages, and various marketing campaigns.
  • Contributed to the development and ownership of platforms like ADS (ads.basalam.com), Karbalad (karbalad.basalam.com), and Vendor (vendor.basalam.com).

I started my front-end development journey by learning HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, which allowed me to build interactive and responsive web pages. I also explored jQuery to enhance UI interactions and simplify DOM manipulation. Through hands-on experience, I developed a strong foundation in creating dynamic web applications.
